Meanwhile, Amelia proved the biggest hit among all names, coming top of the pile in 26 different cities including Birmingham, Leeds and Manchester. Germanic names such as Harry, Henry and Charlie were favoured once again, accounting for nearly half of all the cities for most popular boys' name.
